name: Modest, Inc.
description: Developer of mobile shopping application. The company assists retailers to monetize their products by generating a product list, as a result for the searches conducted by shoppers, by studying their shopping history, similar shoppers, taste and preferences.
one_liner: Developer of mobile shopping application. The company assists retailers to monetize their products by generating a product list, as a result for the searches conducted by shoppers, by studying their shopping history, similar shoppers, taste and preferences.
